heading: How often are you paid by %s insurance?

errors.required: Select how often your insurance provider pays you

amount.label: How much are you paid by %s insurance?
amount.hint: This is the exact amount that is paid into your bank account.

errors.required: Enter the amount paid into your account
errors.notNum: Amount you get paid must only include numbers
errors.badFormat: Enter the amount in the right format, like 125 or 125.50
